name: Hexa Blast! Block Puzzle Game
description:
Welcome to Hexa Block, the simple and fun block puzzle game free for all, kids and adults.
Drag and fit the colorful puzzle pieces into a puzzle board to complete the shapes to WIN.

Complete each puzzle level by fitting the pieces correctly to fill the board.

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the Hexagon blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the frame

Blocks can't be rotated.
Don't worry! No time limits!


Block Game Features:
- Over 200 brain teaser puzzle levels to solve.
- NO TIME LIMIT
- Play offline without WIFI
- Amazing block hexa game graphics
- Share to Facebook and play with friends
- Amazing game effects
- Hundreds of levels that are updating regularly
- Daily rewards each day you return to play
